Directions: In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.  In another bowl, combine the eggs, cream, oil and extract.  Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.  Fold in raspberries.  Fill greased jumbo muffin cups two-thirds full.  Bake at 400 degrees F for 22-25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.  Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen unsweetened raspberries*
